root.name: Dewy's Adventure
root.description: GameplayIn Dewy's Adventure, players control Dewy the dew drop through platforming environments by holding the Wii Remote sideways. The Wii Remote can be tilted to move Dewy, with the D-pad changing his temperature to hot or cold. While in hot mode, Dewy becomes a thunder cloud, allowing him to shock enemies. While in cold mode, Dewy turns into ice, allowing him to slide more quickly, and perform a normal three hit combo.
